MemoryInfobox.name: Change Can Be Taxing
MemoryInfobox.description: 'Reacting quickly to changes in leadership, an opportunistic merchant made quick drachmae. Reacting even more quickly, bandits relieved him of it.'

General_Description: '''Change Can Be Taxing''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A [[merchant]] sought the help of a [[mercenary]]. Kassandra answered.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
